primary.name: AMN
primary.rationale: Best OOD generalization + fastest inference. Production-ready for 95% of queries.

fallback_accuracy.name: Transformer (Optimized)
fallback_accuracy.rationale: Best in-distribution accuracy. Use for high-stakes queries (sci-fact, med-guideline) or low-confidence predictions.

fallback_secondary.name: GRU Stack
fallback_secondary.rationale: Balanced performance. Tertiary fallback if Transformer(opt) remains low-confidence.

quarantined.name: LSTM Baseline

metrics.issue: 14% eval mismatch - investigating data split, checkpoint load, or metric implementation

quarantined.rationale: DO NOT DEPLOY until discrepancy is resolved.

deployment_notes.monitoring: Shadow eval 1-5% queries, alert if OOD delta drops > 0.03 over 24h
